entry.title: Sunday: Chance of flurries. High plus 1. POP 30%
entry.summary: Sunny this morning then a mix of sun and cloud with 30 percent chance of flurries late this afternoon. Wind southwest 30 km/h gusting to 50. High plus 1. Wind chill minus 14 this morning. UV index 3 or moderate. Forecast issued 05:00 AM MST Sunday 26 February 2023

entry.title: Sunday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 16. POP 30%
entry.summary: Partly cloudy with 30 percent chance of flurries early this evening. Clearing this evening. Wind southwest 40 km/h gusting to 60 becoming light after midnight. Low minus 16. Wind chill minus 14 this evening and minus 7 overnight. Forecast issued 05:00 AM MST Sunday 26 February 2023

entry.title: Monday: Mainly sunny. High minus 3.
entry.summary: Mainly sunny. Wind becoming southwest 20 km/h gusting to 40 late in the morning. High minus 3. Wind chill minus 17 in the morning and minus 8 in the afternoon. UV index 2 or low. Forecast issued 05:00 AM MST Sunday 26 February 2023
